results.content: Overall a great course, if you are on a mac though it does get pretty confusing in the last section (which is a bummer because that is the critical section imho).
results.content_html: Overall a great course, if you are on a mac though it does get pretty confusing in the last section (which is a bummer because that is the critical section imho).

results.content:
The course was good overall and a decent introduction to express.js, node.js and Mongodb. But after everything was installed an Mongo was available zero examples of what to do with it. Some very simple console logging is all that was done.

This isn't a Mongo course and that's fine but after doing all the setup work I would expect one more chapter on some simple Mongo database examples.

There were also two videos repeated during the course.
